title: Sinful Succulence Morgana's Story
body:
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/veRMC77XUqo/maxresdefault.jpg

Now that Morgana is finally getting a update, what was her story about the Sinful Succulence bakery? I thought there's some official stories but i can't find it anywhere... is it in Demacia?

replies.body: She's a walk-on celebrity chef in the multiverse's #1 cooking show.  She also owns a string of bakeries.
can it be renamed to Patisseir or Sinful Patissier Morgana cause succulence can be misleading, it is a plant unless you're partaining the word Juicy. Please thought about it. Thanks

> [{quoted}](name=JonnyBoyy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZlrFqusJ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-08-10T11:41:01.792+0000)
>
> can it be renamed to Patisseir or Sinful Patissier Morgana cause succulence can be misleading, it is a plant unless you're partaining the word Juicy. Please thought about it. Thanks

it can reference both. the actual definition is both related to vegetation and being "moist and toothsome"

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZlrFqusJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-09T21:44:48.937+0000)
>
> She's a walk-on celebrity chef in the multiverse's #1 cooking show.  She also owns a string of bakeries.

Hopefully her new story will still featuring this.

"_She's the original sugary sin, the dark diva of confectionary cunning, the fallen angel of fantastic flavor. Her terrifying treats will trap you in your seat. Let's give a Culinary Masters welcome to Morgana._" 
This is the only one I'm aware of since they moved her to the '_[Culinary Masters skinline](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Culinary_Masters)'._ With her rework I hope Baker {{champion:80}} gets a cameo in her new splashart.

> [{quoted}](name=Wrathof300,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ZlrFqusJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-07T22:31:33.560+0000)
>
> "_She's the original sugary sin, the dark diva of confectionary cunning, the fallen angel of fantastic flavor. Her terrifying treats will trap you in your seat. Let's give a Culinary Masters welcome to Morgana._" 
> This is the only one I'm aware of since they moved her to the '_[Culinary Masters skinline](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Culinary_Masters)'._ With her rework I hope Baker {{champion:80}} gets a cameo in her new splashart.

Thank you!! I think I remember someone mentioned that she was in the journal justice too? Anyone knows about that?

Yes, the skin was originally "canon"; she owned a bakery.  Just like how Pentakill Sona/Mordekaiser were originally playing together is Zaun, looking for new band members, in canon.  Skins are now alternate universes, of course. :)
A really really long time ago in old lore she had a bakery in Noxus. It got closed down for some reason
and smoke follows her everywhere LOL
i hope with the visual update, for this skin, she will Q ginger breads XD
